Description:
Detects the execution of powershell, a WebClient object creation and the invocation of DownloadFile in a single command line

Author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PowerShell DownloadFile
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where (command like '%powershell%' and command like '%.downloadfile%' and command like '%system.net.webclient%')
